implementation_output.changes_summary: Added HTTP GET /health endpoint using FastMCP custom_route decorator. Imports starlette Request and JSONResponse. Handler calls check_health(), enriches with version and uptime, returns 200 for healthy/degraded and 503 for unhealthy. Added TestHealthEndpoint class with 4 tests covering route registration and all status codes.

results.note: health_data.get('status') used safely; check_health() always returns dict with 'status' key
All 21 tests pass including 4 new TestHealthEndpoint tests
